alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 5:29AM CDT until March 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN JOHNSON...EASTERN PARKER AND TARRANT COUNTIES... At 528 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pecan Acres to Godley, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Hurst, Burleson, Cleburne, Southlake, Weatherford, Watauga, Colleyville, Benbrook, Saginaw, White Settlement and Crowley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately.
